title: GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_INDEX_BY_HASH
content:
0xE0EE05F8// GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash
int GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_INDEX_BY_HASH(int interiorId, int roomHash);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.roomHash: Interior room hash.Returns: Room index, -1 if failed.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  print("current room index is: " .. roomId)
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash
int GET_INTERIOR_ROOM_INDEX_BY_HASH(int interiorId, int roomHash);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomHash = GetRoomKeyFromEntity(playerPed)
local roomId = GetInteriorRoomIndexByHash(interiorId, roomHash)

if roomId ~= -1 then
  print("current room index is: " .. roomId)
end
